The probability of male gender and being lactose intolerant is 1%. Is the chance of being lactose intolerant larger when observing male gender?

The more direct and strong relationship is between department competitiveness and lactose intolerance, which is not directly related to male gender. The probability of being lactose intolerant is higher when not observing male gender (51% vs 1%), which suggests that the chance of being lactose intolerant is larger when not observing male gender.<|eot_id|>
